summary: Completed comprehensive testing of calendar highlighting and reset all data features. All specified features are working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend /api/admin/reset endpoint validation (rejects wrong confirm, accepts 'RESET')
Calendar month jumping to trip start month when start_date is set
Calendar CSS styling with correct colors and border radius
Reset all data flow requiring typing 'RESET' in frontend
Reset confirmation input validation and error messages
Reset success redirects to dashboard and clears input
Calendar hint text updates correctly based on date selection
Calendar highlighting clears when dates are removed
Trip data persistence with structured dates (start_date/end_date)
All backend API endpoints functioning correctly (25/25 tests passed)
